title: [Self-Directed] Online-Based Authentic Project Design: Strengthening Social Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and project management experience
context.additional_context: Task execution based on real-world cases for corporate social contribution project leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can plan and implement social contribution projects required in real corporate environments.
Learners can manage project timelines and budgets while mediating conflicts among stakeholders.
Learners can develop and apply measurement indicators to evaluate the effectiveness of produced projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
